name: iKun AI Chasing Game
description:
Developed a five level 3D iKun Chasing game with multiple enemies. Player can use mouse to control the object to collect the key to go to next level. Be careful with enemies since they are shooting balls to player : )

Team members - 

Shangyu Xie

Chen, Christ 

Kabir, Masrur

Yilin, Zhao

Git Repo https://github.com/0Christ1/iKun
